price: Ni jedhu: “dhugumatti, isin mirga irraan [gaarii fakkeessuun] nutti dhufaa turtan.”
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَأۡتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qālū innakum kuntum tatūnanā ʿani al-yamīni
